title: Kingdom at Sea
description: After the destruction of the Five Realms, the remnant that escaped by sea searches for a new home. As the king's health worsens, Sar Wilek assumes command and struggles to rule the disjointed people while Prince Trevn learns to captain a ship. Unbeknownst to the princes, their enemies are also on board, hiding in plain sight."
author: Jill Williamson
